alert.note: Alert for Florence (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 3:37PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Florence County through 415 PM CDT... At 336 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorm near Whisker Lake Wilderness, or 16 miles southeast of Iron River, moving southeast at 35 mph. Another strong thunderstorm was located southeast of Alvin. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Fern around 345 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Kingsford and Homestead. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for northeastern Wisconsin.
